channel.title: Server Connection - Urgent
channel.description:
Any help would be greatly appreciated, Thankyou in advance.
Client can only connect to server if :
192.168.xx.xx is placed in settings.ini
what gateway am i looking for, for the client side that corresponds to the above....(for players which are external to my network)

item.title: Server Connection - Urgent
item.dc:creator: @adu adu
item.description:
@adu wrote:

Have you tried portforwarding the game port to your gateway ip from your router so that all incoming traffic connecting to that ip will be directed to your computer?

Read full topic

ok its become apparent that i can not connect through the gateway i.p. so i will need to run a test with someone if they are willing to participate.

kingbobling@hotmail.co.uk - MSN Messenger

item.title: Server Connection - Urgent
item.dc:creator: @adu adu
item.description:
@adu wrote:

Your ip in the settings folder client side should be your external ip (the one you get when you go to whatsmyip.org).

Server side, your ip would be your internal ip (the 192.168 one) that your router assigns to your computer. keep in mind that the 192.168 ip that you should be using is not the one you use to connect to your router but what your router assigns to your computer to identify it.

Read full topic
